mapper.sql: select u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.password, u.sex, u.status, u.plc, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, u.company_id, u.id_card, u.family_address, u.car_card, u.birthday, u.position_card_no, u.join_date, u.hik_card, u.factory_id, u.title, u.mng_mk, u.fct_dor_nm, u.fvid, u.peison_id, u.age, u.face, u.face_id, u.emp_no, u.car_id, u.sended, u.sn_num, u.display_status, u.emis_standard , u.emis_standard_name , u.env_sign, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.status as dept_status, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select:
select u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.nick_name, u.user_name, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.password, u.sex, u.plc,u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, d.dept_name, d.leader,u.company_id, u.id_card, u.sn_num,u.family_address, u.birthday, u.position_card_no, u.join_date, u.hik_card, u.factory_id, u.title, u.mng_mk, u.fct_dor_nm, u.fvid, u.peison_id, u.age, u.face, u.face_id, u.emp_no,u.car_id, u.car_card, u.sended , u.emis_standard ,u.emis_standard_name ,u.env_sign, d1.dept_name as factory_name from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.user_id=r.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role e ON r.role_id=e.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d1 ON u.factory_id = CAST ( d1.dept_id AS VARCHAR ) where u.del_flag = '0'
AND e.role_id= #{roleId}
AND u.sended= #{sended}
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
AND u.id_card like concat('%', #{idCard}, '%')
AND u.factory_id = #{factoryId}
AND u.emp_no like concat('%', #{empNo}, '%')
AND u.sn_num like concat('%', #{snNum}, '%')
AND u.nick_name like concat('%', #{nickName}, '%')
AND d1.dept_name like concat('%', #{factoryStr}, '%')
and (face !='' OR face IS NOT NULL) and (face ='' OR face IS NULL)
AND (u.dept_id = #{deptId} OR u.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.dept_id FROM sys_dept t WHERE CHARINDEX(cast(#{deptId} as nvarchar),ancestors)>0))
${params.dataScope}

select distinct u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email,u.sn_num, u.phonenumber, u.status, u.create_time,u.plc from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.del_flag = '0' and (r.role_id != #{roleId} or r.role_id IS NULL) and u.user_id not in (select u.user_id from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId})
AND u.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
${params.dataScope}
select count(1) from sys_user where user_name = #{userName} AND del_flag = '0'
select * from sys_user where emp_no = #{no} AND del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( user_id, dept_id, factory_id, user_name, nick_name, email, avatar, phonenumber, sex, password, status, create_by, remark, birthday, id_card, family_address, car_id, car_card, face, emp_no, position_card_no, sn_num,, join_date, sended, plc, display_status, create_time )values( #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{factoryId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex}, #{password}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, #{birthday}, #{idCard}, #{familyAddress}, #{carId}, #{carCard}, #{face}, #{empNo}, #{positionCardNo}, #{snNum}, #{joinDate}, #{sended}, #{plc}, #{displayStatus}, getdate() )
mapper.update: update sys_user set del_flag = '2', face_id = user_name, user_name = newId() where user_id = #{userId}

update sys_user set del_flag = '2', face_id = user_name, user_name = newId() where user_id in
#{userId}
mapper.delete: update sys_user set face = null, sended = 8 where user_id = #{userId}
update sys_user set face = null, sended = 8 where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.update: update sys_user set face = #{face} where id_card = #{idCard}

insert.foreach: insert into sys_user( dept_id, factory_id, user_name, nick_name, email, avatar, phonenumber, sex, password, status, create_by, remark, birthday, id_card, family_address, car_id, car_card, face, emp_no, position_card_no, sn_num,, join_date, sended, plc, display_status, create_time )values( #{item.deptId}, #{item.factoryId}, #{item.userName}, #{item.nickName}, #{item.email}, #{item.avatar}, #{item.phonenumber}, #{item.sex}, #{item.password}, #{item.status}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.remark}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.idCard}, #{item.familyAddress}, #{item.carId}, #{item.carCard}, #{item.face}, #{item.empNo}, #{item.positionCardNo}, #{item.snNum}, #{item.joinDate}, #{item.sended}, #{item.plc}, #{item.displayStatus}, getdate() )
